alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; East Glacier Park Region; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 9:27AM MST until December 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on the Rocky Mountain Front could cause areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, East Glacier Park Region and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of snow could reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; East Glacier Park Region; Northern Blaine County
